version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + PeloReaper for ReaPack released.

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + New features: FavSrc and Misc actions (See PeloReaperExtGuide_*.pdf)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + New feature: MIDI action (Toggle Key-snap) + Update: [FavSrc]Override folder on export/import media dialog + Update: [FavSrc]Filename filter multiple keywords on import dialog (If you want to learn more, see PeloReaperExtGuide_*.pdf)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + New features: A lot of actions for MIDI Editing + New features: Actions for opening REAPER project file from wav file which has BWF(bext) info + Update: [FavSrc] Save some setting windows' position to REAPER (If you want to learn more, see PeloReaperExtGuide_*.pdf)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + New features: Send MIDI note ON/OFF on MIDI Editor + New features: Some MIDI CC actions (Insert multiple pitch CC, Set CC values interpolated)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: Send MIDI note ON/OFF according to scale setting on MIDI Editor + Added: Some mode-switchable actions for executing actions according to scale settings + Added: MIDI CC interpolation (selected CC's min,max will be the value interpolation range)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Requisites: REAPER v6.11 or later + Added: NEUTRINO automation action + Added: MIDI Editor: Select key signature root actions + Added: Misc zoom selected items action + Fixed: Copy and Replace Items Source actions failed with sources having section-info (e.g. Reversed)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Fixed: Some display scaling problems (provisional)

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Requisites: REAPER v6.19 or later + Added: MediaFolder features and actions

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Fixed: [MediaFolder] Improve performance in some cases

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Requisites: .Net Framework 4.7.2, VisualStudio 2019 VisualC++ Redistributable(x64) + Added: GameSynth features and actions

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Modified: [FX-Randomizer]Improve performance, fix some crash problems + Modified: [Neutrino]Singer(model) selection enumerates existent models only

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Modified: Plugin loading time faster + Modified: [MediaFolder]Supports .RTrackTemplate file, improve some gui behavior

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added and Modified: MediaFolder features (MediaExplorer collaboration functions, global Quick-Path, and so on.) + Added: Subtitle actions (SRT file read/write features) + Added: Various misc features

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: [FavSrc]Option to copy folder name to Prefix when switching subfolder selection + Modified: Changed the capitalization rule for all actions + Modified: Minor bug fixes and some improvements

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: [Neutrino]Various options(NSF, StyleShift, WorldOptions) + Modified: [Neutrino]Fixed some crash bug when executing Neutrino batch file + Modified: [Neutrino]Supported NEUTRINO version is v1.0.0 or higher

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: [Dancer]Toggle switch of the Dancer window's top-most state

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: [MIDI]Actions for note pitch randomization with range settings + Added: [Misc]Actions for switching/moving fx chain windows and more + Modified: Minor bug fixes

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: [Misc]Actions for controlling fx chain windows + Added: [Misc]Actions for creating video image sequence(thumbnails) track

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Modified: [Misc]Video thumbnails: fix problem when converting with ffmpeg, and so on.

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: VOICEVOX CORE Integration features.

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Modified: Fixed VOICEVOX TTS settings dialog issue

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Added: VOICEVOX ENGINE Integration features

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Removed: VOICEVOX CORE Integration features + Modified: VOICEVOX ENGINE Integration csv file format, some implovements

version.author: pelori
version.changelog: + Add a new toolbar icon.
